titles.title: A bill for the relief of the T.W. Rounds Company of Providence, Rhode Island.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/17/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named company in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States arising out of the loss of merchandise that was detained by the U.S. Customs Service.
